data.title: Fixing prices: A century of setting, posting and adjusting retail prices
data.sourcetitle: Fixing Prices: A Century of Setting, Posting and Adjusting Retail Prices
data.abstract: Shedding light on a range of price fixing mechanisms and price display technologies, this incisive book offers a clear overview of the retail price setting, posting and adjusting processes. Based on a detailed study of a century of pricing practices in the US retail sector, it explores the anthropology and sociology of valuation practices by concentrating on the way prices are fabricated.
